name: Dhiraj Sagar, Senior Producer
dis: Enivesh Team was very helpful throughout the process. They updated me whenever I asked them. The insurance company though wasn't as prompt as Enivesh at certain stages. But they ironed out the process at regular intervals. Their tone of talking too is very enterprising and they tries their best to solve the problems we face. My Overall experience was good.

name: Mahesh Lekhrao
dis: My experience allover was very good, the claim was settled very easily without any problem, I would like to thank the ENIVESH team.
